page.title: 05LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: Based in Halifax, the local{newspaper, the{'Evening Courier'}is distributed throughout{Calderdale.}A typical edition of the 'Voice of Calderdale', tells of the main local events as well as outlining the national topics. One specific edition, that printed on July 31, 1985, headlines a story concerning a four-man delegation to be sent to Brazil for an international conference on local authorities. The paper also wrote cover stories on a Sowerby Bridge man who conned showbusiness stars into giving him money supposedly in aid of striking miners, and a young Ovenden man who used his weightlifting equipment to plunge a bayonet-like dagger into his body.
